column5: Our beautiful home was built in the 1940's and was carefully restored, updated and decorated in December 2016. It's located in the Westside/Arlington Heights neighborhood of Fort Worth, right off I-30 with convenient access to all that Fort Worth has to offer: Will Rodgers Coliseum, downtown, 7th street, TCU, Colonial Country. My place is GREAT for families (with kids of all ages), for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and big groups.
column8: Charming Home, excellent access to all of Ft Worth
